content: sock pattern generator at knittingrecipes com generates a sock recipe for you based on your gauge foot circumference foot length and construction preferences you have the option of cuff-down with a flap and gusset heel or a short row heel or toe-up with a short row heel obviously you can substitute anything you want it has 10% negative ease built right into the stitch counts this is not a tutorial but it is a free thorough vanilla sock pattern customized for you every time without you having to do any math whatsoever
